"""
 Check installed business templates one 
 by one. If one of the business templates does not 
 use the latest release, then we need to migrate.
 
 NOTE: this means that if a system uses custom
 business templates (ie. dedicate), upgrader 
 will for now fail.
 """
 # Initialize variables
 portal_templates = context.getPortalObject().portal_templates
 signature = context.ERP5Site_getUpgraderSignature()
 release = signature['release']
 is_upgradable = False
 message_list = []
 
 # verify only core is enough for now. 
 template_version = context.ERP5Site_getBusinessTemplateVersion()
 if template_version != release:
 is_upgradable = True
 
 # No need to upgrade (system is up to date)
 if not is_upgradable:
 return message_list
 
 message_list.append(\
 "Upgrade Required for Business Templates, Expected: %s , Current: %s." \
 % (release, template_version))
 
 # Notify that Business Template requires upgrade
 if not upgrade:
 return message_list
 
 # update all public bt5s
 previous_bt5_id = None
 bt5_counter = 0
 required_bt5_id_list = signature['required_bt5_id_list']
 upgradable_bt5_id_list = signature['upgradable_bt5_id_list']
 reinstalable_bt5_id_list = signature['reinstalable_bt5_id_list']
 before_triggered_bt5_id_dict = signature['before_triggered_bt5_id_dict']
 after_triggered_bt5_id_dict = signature['after_triggered_bt5_id_dict']
 update_catalog_bt5_id_list = signature['update_catalog_bt5_id_list']
 
 
 base_url_list = signature['bt5_base_url_list']
 installed_bt5_title_list = [o.getTitle() for o in portal_templates.getInstalledBusinessTemplateList()]
 
 bt5_counter = portal_templates.countFolder()[0][0]
 
 def installBT5(bt5_title, previous_bt5, bt5_counter):
 bt5_id = "%s_%s_%s" % (bt5_counter, bt5_title, release)
 # no need to update a bt5 if it's to be explicitly added later 
 bt5_url = portal_templates.getBusinessTemplateUrl(base_url_list, bt5_title)
 if portal_templates.has_key(bt5_id):
 raise ValueError, 'Business Template %s has already been imported' % bt5_id
 if bt5_url is None:
 message_list.append("%s was ignored because was not possible found"
 "the bt5 into the followed repositories: %s" % \
 (bt5_title, base_url_list) )
 return previous_bt5
 kw = dict(activity = "SQLQueue", tag = bt5_id)
 if previous_bt5 is not None:
 kw['after_tag'] = previous_bt5
 # We must make sure all documents from previous installations 
 # are already indexed (specially categories).
 kw['after_method_id'] = "immediateReindexObject"
 update_catalog = bt5_title in update_catalog_bt5_id_list 
 before_triggered_bt5_id_list = before_triggered_bt5_id_dict.get(bt5_title, ())
 after_triggered_bt5_id_list = after_triggered_bt5_id_dict.get(bt5_title, ())
 keep_original_list = signature['keep_original_dict'].get(bt5_title, ())
 portal_templates.activate(**kw).updateBusinessTemplateFromUrl(
 bt5_url, id = bt5_id, 
 keep_original_list=keep_original_list,
 before_triggered_bt5_id_list=before_triggered_bt5_id_list,
 after_triggered_bt5_id_list=after_triggered_bt5_id_list,
 update_catalog=update_catalog)
 
 previous_bt5_id = bt5_id
 bt5_counter += 1
 message_list.append("\tUpdate %s as %s" % (bt5_url, bt5_id))
 return bt5_id
 
 def reinstallBT5(bt5_title, previous_bt5, bt5_counter):
 bt5_id = "%s_%s_%s" % (bt5_counter, bt5_title, release)
 kw = dict(activity="SQLQueue", tag=bt5_id)
 if previous_bt5 is not None:
 kw['after_tag'] = previous_bt5
 # We must make sure all documents from previous installations 
 # are already indexed (specially categories).
 kw['after_method_id'] = "immediateReindexObject"
 update_catalog = bt5_title in update_catalog_bt5_id_list
 portal_templates.activate(**kw).TemplateTool_reinstallBT5(
 bt5_title,
 update_catalog=update_catalog)
 
 previous_bt5_id = bt5_id
 bt5_counter += 1
 message_list.append("\t%s Reinstalling" % (bt5_id))
 return bt5_id
 
 previous_bt5 = None
 for bt in upgradable_bt5_id_list:
 if bt in installed_bt5_title_list:
 bt5_counter += 1
 bt_id = installBT5(bt, previous_bt5, bt5_counter)
 previous_bt5 = bt_id
 
 for bt in required_bt5_id_list:
 bt5_counter += 1
 bt_id = installBT5(bt, previous_bt5, bt5_counter)
 previous_bt5 = bt_id
 
 for bt in reinstalable_bt5_id_list:
 bt5_counter += 1
 bt_id = reinstallBT5(bt, previous_bt5, bt5_counter)
 previous_bt5 = bt_id
 
 message_list.append("Upgrade Executed for Business Configuration using activities.")
 
 return message_list
